title: Our inheritance from the past
brief_description: Explains, for American school children, how certain features of modern life have been inherited from the past. Instances the farm cultivator which developed from the ancient plough; the highway and its origin in Roman road-making; the wheel which was introduced in early history. The film also describes how knowledge is passed on either orally, in writing or in print.
